text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Kherson Raion | native_name = Херсонський район | native_name_lang = uk | settlement_type = Raion | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = | flag_alt = | image_shield = | shield_alt = | image_map = Khersonskiy rayon 2020.svg | mapsize = | map_alt = | map_caption = | pushpin_map = | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_map_caption = | coordinates = | coor_pinpoint = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Oblast | subdivision_name1 = | seat_type = Admin. center | seat = Kherson | government_footnotes = | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 3,841.9 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 450233 | population_as_of = 2022 | population_density_km2 = auto | area_code = | iso_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Kherson Raion (; ) is a raion (district) of Kherson Oblast, Ukraine. The population was As of 2023's fourth quarter, Russian soldiers are occupying large parts of the district. ==References== Category:Raions of Ukraine Category:Kherson Oblast
